1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>A eb yob nabal, chi na eb tol c'am Dios. Junlajan max yun yetaxtok nabal eb. C'am axcaxa yobal max yun eb. C'am mac chi unen watx'c'ulalil.</t>
2: <t>Atac'al bay satcan t'anantek Cham Jehová jin ayon anima on ti', yuj yiloni ta ay junok mac chi nachaj el yuj, ta ay mac chi naon Cham.</t>
3: <t>A eb masanil max bekcan watx' beybalej. Junlajan max yun yetnentok ba eb. Tok ayto wal mactxel chi unen watx' beybalej. Tutun c'am mactxel, tamwal junok.</t>
4: <pb/><t>C'am chi nachaj el yuj eb unem yobtakil, a ton eb chi c'ayon el eb wet conob axcaokxac'al tol loj, cax c'am chi yal ba eb bay Dios.</t>
5: <t>Caxc'al c'am tzet yuj xan chi bil eb, palta max bilaj eb yuj xiwilal. A Dios max saklemnejcantok is bakil eb ajc'ul. Max cancan eb yin q'uixawc'ulalil, yujtol maj chalay eb yuj Dios.</t>
6: <pb/><t>¡Matawal a bay tzalan Sión chi tit co colbanil ayon Israel on ti'! A yet ok yak'on Jehová is watx'c'ulalil jiban junelxa, ok tzaloj aj co c'ul ayon yinatil on Jacob ti', cax ok el lenaj ok jil on.</t>
